title: China
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 456 words, Level L (Grade 2), Lexile 580L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     U and Z
description: As one of the largest countries in the world, China has many interesting things to explore. Students will learn about unique people as well as many different landforms and some of the animals that live in China. Vibrant maps and photographs accompany the text.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
